She has a business selling mineral water in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from E-loading (mobile prepaid load), tricycle transport, and general store businesses. Sylvia is borrowing PHP 18,000 through NWTF to purchase more stock to sell for her mineral water business.

Sylvia has been sustaining her business activities through her past eight loans from NWTF, and more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of mineral water to sell.

loans.name: Jamilya

texts.ru: Чамиля жительница района Шахритус. Ей 42 года. Она замужем и является матерью пятерых девочек. Чамиля очень трудолюбивая и усердная женщина. Она работает на нескольких работах, чтобы ее семья ни в чем не нуждалась. Чамиля работает директором в сельской школе. Одновременно она занимается сельским хозяйством, и обеспечивает семью за счет земледелия. Сейчас Чамиля запрашивает кредит для начала нового бизнеса. Она выбрала сферу животноводства, так как это дело не требует тяжелого труда и прибыльнее. Чамиля берет кредит для закупа крупно-рогатого скота и его корма.
texts.en: Jamilya lives in the Shahrituz region of Tajikistan.  She is 42 years old, married and is the mother of five girls.  Jamilya is a very hardworking and industrious woman.  She works at a number of jobs so that her family doesn't want for anything.  She works as the director of a rural school.  At the same time, she farms, and feeds her family with the foods she grows.  Now, Jamilya is asking for a loan to start a new business.  She wants to begin working with livestock since it is not that difficult and is very profitable.  This loan will help her buy a cow and its feed.

loans.use: to buy a cow and to buy feed for it

loans.name: Firuza

texts.ru: Фируза со своей семьей живет в городе Душанбе. Она замужняя женщина и заботливая мать. Ей 32 года, она воспитывает 5-ых детей. У нее две дочери и трое сыновей. Ее муж работает, а дети учатся в школе. Она пунктуальная и ответственная женщина. У нее среднее образование. Она несколько лет работала в столовой поваром. Полтора года назад Фируза  открыла лепешечный цех для выпекания хлеба, и занимается собственным бизнесом. Фируза запрашивает кредит на покупку сырья для своей деятельности. В дальнейшем Фируза планирует открыть еще один цех для производства лепешек и расширить бизнес.
texts.en: Firuza lives with her family in the city of Dushanbe.  She is a married woman and a caring mother.  She is 32 years old and is raising 5 children.  She has two daughters and three sons.  Her husband works and the children go to school.  She is a punctual and accountable woman and has received a higher education.  For a few years, she worked as a cook in a kitchen.  A year and a half ago, Firuza opened a bakery where she bakes bread and runs her own business.  Firuza is asking for a loan to buy the cooking materials she needs.  In the future, she plans to open an additional store to sell from and expand her business.

loans.use: to buy cooking materials need to bake bread.

loans.name: Rosalita

texts.en:
Rosalita is a 52-year-old married woman from Talibon, Bohol. She is the mother of a 23-year-old son. 

Rosalita is engaged in farming. She grows rice and has been farming rice for 30 years. Rosalita requested a loan of 30,000 PHP to buy fertilizers, pesticides and rice seedlings to increase the volume of her harvest, as well as her income.  

In the future, Rosalita would like to expand her business to improve their livelihood status.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, pesticides and rice seedlings.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a computerized sewing machine

loans.name: Gulrukhsor

texts.ru: Гулрухсор 48-летняя замужняя женщина. Она является матерью четверых детей. Гулрухсор со своей семьей проживает в городе Вахдат.  Она зарабатывает на жизнь занимаясь торговлей. Гулрухсор на центральном рынке города имеет собственный магазин, где продает продукты питания, в частности: печенье, булочки, фруктовые соки, фарш, колбасные изделия и т.д., а также хозяйственные товары. Она работает в сфере торговли уже 16 лет. Кредит запрашивает для закупа ассортимента товаров (продуктов питания) в свой магазин с целью увеличения товарооборота.
texts.en: Gulrukhsor is a 48-year-old married woman, the mother of 4 children.  She and her family live in the city of Vahdat.  She earns her living working in trade.  Gulrukhsor has her own space at a central market where she sells food goods such as cookies, rolls, fruit juice, hamburger, sausage, etc.  She also sells household goods.  This has been her profession for 16 years.  She's asking for a loan to buy an assortment of food goods for her inventory with the goal of increasing turnover.

loans.use: to buy an assortment of food goods for her store

texts.ru: Аминчон житель города Душанбе, столицы Таджикистана. Он молодой холостой человек. Ему 24 года. Он живет с матерью. Его мать занимается выпечкой и продажей самбусы (пирожков с начинкой). У Аминчона высшее образование, но по специальности еще не работал. Он занимается производством и продажей шаурмы. Сейчас он хотел бы открыть летний кафе. Для этого у него имеется место для деятельности. Он хочет провести там ремонт и закупить необходимые принадлежности. С этой целью он запрашивает кредит.
texts.en: Aminjon is a resident of Dushanbe, the capital of Tajikistan.  He is a young bachelor, 24 years old, and lives with his mother who works baking and selling pies.  Aminjon has received a higher education but has never worked in the profession he studied for.  Now he cooks and sells shawarma and wants to open his own cafe.  His has a space for this.  He wants to make renovations and buy the necessary supplies.  It's for this purpose he's taking out a loan.

loans.name: Gerry

texts.en:
Gerry is 40 years old, married, and has three children who are currently studying. He works as a farmer and he aims to increase his production, as well as his income, to further provide the growing needs of his family and to support the education of his children.

Due to the high cost of commodities and school fees, Gerry also engages in the hog-raising business to generate additional income. He wants to raise more hogs to sell, but he has inadequate capital. 

For this reason, Gerry is asking for an additional of PHP 25,000 to buy feed, vitamins, and additional piglets to raise. Through his patience and strong determination, he believes that he will improve the business. He hopes that Kiva lenders, through ASKI, will grant his loan request.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins, and additional pigs to raise.

loans.name: Ileana Del Socorro

texts.es:
Ileana , 48 años de edad, es habitante de Teustepe municipio de Boaco, casada , madre de tres hijos de 25,20 y 16 años de edad, ella es comerciante se dedica a la venta de comida . Este negocio lo heredo de su madre que al morir se lo heredo a Ileana anteriormente ella trabajaba en una empresa privada renuncio y con la liquidación que le dieron decidió invertirlo en el negocio de comidas. Lleva más de 10 años  con este negocio el cual le ha permitido mantener a su familia. 
Dentro de sus expectativas desea mejorar la cocina de su negocio, darle una mejor atención a su clientela , brindar el servicio de bufet. 
Ella necesita el financiamiento para comprar granos básicos, aceite, azúcar, leña, verduras, carne, empaque para comidas. Su principal meta es que sus hijos logren tener una carrera profesional y lograr mantener el negocio estable y hacerlo crecer cada dia.
texts.en:
48-year-old Ileana lives in Teustepe, in the town of Boaco. She's married and has three children aged 25, 20 and 16 years. She's a merchant who sells food. This business was handed over to her by her mother, who left it to Ileana when she died. She used to work for a private company, then she quit her job and decided to invest the severance they paid her in the food business. She has been in this business for over 10 years, and it has allowed her to support her family.
Within her expectations, she wishes to improve the kitchen in her business, provide better service for her customers and provide buffet services.
She needs the loan in order to purchase essential grains, cooking oil, sugar, firewood, vegetables, meat, and food containers. Her main goal is to have her children succeed in having a professional career. Another main goal is to be able to keep the business solid and to make it grow on a daily basis.

loans.use: to purchase essential grains, cooking oil, sugar, firewood, vegetables, meat, and food containers.

loans.name: Sara Olimpia

texts.es:
Sara tiene 72 años de edad, es casada y tiene 15 hijos. Desde la edad de los 12 años empezó a ayudar a sus padres con las actividades agrícolas y con los oficios domésticos en su casa. 

Para comprar los insumos agrícolas tiene que caminara pies durante veinte minutos por calles balastreadas hasta llegar a la carretera en donde aborda un autobús que tarda en llegar a la ciudad más cercana treinta minutos. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar insumos agrícolas para sembrar maíz, maicillo y fríjol. El préstamo le servirá para comprar los insumos a tiempo y poder obtener una producción que le permita vender una parte y la otra para el consumo familiar. De esta manera apoya mucho a su esposo con los gastos del hogar.
texts.en:
Sara is 72 years old, married and has 15 children. From the age of 12 she began helping her parents with farming activities and household chores at home.

To purchase farming supplies she has to walk for twenty minutes by foot on gravel streets to get to the road where she gets on a bus that takes more than half an hour to get to the nearest town.

The loan she is applying for from Fundación Campo, is to buy farming supplies to sow maize, sorghum and beans. The loan will be used to purchase supplies on time and to obtain a production that allows her to sell some and keep the rest for family consumption. In this way she supports her husband a lot with the household expenses.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies to sow corn, sorghum and beans.

loans.name: Miriam Del Carmen

texts.es: Miriam, una joven madre quien se las ingenia día a día como mantener a sus tres hijos siendo madre soltera, con su pequeña venta variada busca como salir adelante y que a sus hijos no les falte el pan de cada día, ella solicita el crédito nuevamente para invertir en su negocio el cual ya no tiene muchos productos y es su única manera de generar ingresos para los diferentes gastos que se le presentan como colegiaturas, alimentación, a los que tiene que darles solución.
texts.en:
Miriam is a young mother who manages to support her three children every day as a single mother.

With her small business selling a variety of things she looks for ways to get ahead so her children never lack their daily sustenance.

She's requesting a loan again to invest in her business.  She doesn't have a lot of products and it's her only way to generate income for the various expenses that come up that she has to find a way to pay, such as school costs and food.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics, clothing, and footwear

loans.name: Flora Zenayda

texts.es:
Flora, 36 años de edad, madre de 2 hijos de 18 y 15 años de edad, habita en Teustepe, Boaco, se dedica a la elaboración y venta de tortillas desde hace 7 años. Inicio cuando su esposo quedo sin empleo y era quien mantenía a la familia, la necesidad de darles de comer y mandar a la escuela a sus hijos la impulso a poner su negocio de lo que sabía en este caso la elaboración de tortillas empezó con 5 libras de maíz ahora trabaja con 33 libras de maíz sus labores empiezan desde tempranas horas de la mañana en el molina de maíz, su hija le ayuda a vender tortillas mientras Flora se dedica a elaborar las tortillas.
Hoy está necesitando el financiamiento para comprar maíz y leña. Uno de sus planes es comprar una cocina industrial mejorar su humilde comal, su meta es lograr darle estudios a sus hijos y tengan una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
36-year-old Flora has two children aged 18 and 15 years. She lives in Teustepe, Boaco, and has been making and selling tortillas for the past seven years. She got her start when her husband became unemployed. Since her husband was the one who supported the family, the need to feed her children and send them to school prompted her to start a business she was familiar with - in this case, making tortillas. She began with five pounds of corn and nowadays she works with 33 pounds of corn. Her work starts from the early hours of the morning at the corn mill. Her daughter helps her to sell the tortillas while Flora has the task of making them.
She's currently requesting a loan in order to purchase corn and firewood. One of her plans is to buy an industrial kitchen and improve her modest griddle. Her goal is to be able to provide education for her children and improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase corn and firewood.

loans.name: Gloria Cristina

texts.es:
Gloria tiene 42 años de edad, es madre soltera de tres hijos, un varón de 21 años de edad y dos mujeres de 15 y 13 años respectivamente. Se dedica a realizar los oficios domésticos en su casa y a las labores agrícolas junto a su hijo. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar semilla, herbicidas para cultivar la tierra y comprara un cafetín ya que vende antojitos típicos los domingos en el campo, comprara yuca para su negocio. Con la inversión, espera cultivar a tiempo y aplicar los insumos en la cantidad correcta para que su cosecha sea buena; además, instalara el cafetín para vender más cómodamente y segura. Ella desea brindar a sus dos hijos menores todo lo necesario para que puedan desarrollarse y que puedan terminar sus estudios superiores.
texts.en:
Gloria, 42, is the single mother of three children, a 21-year-old male and two females, ages 15 and 13.  She works in the home and does agricultural work with her son.

The loan she's requesting from Fundación Campo is to buy seed and herbicide to farm the land.  She's also going to buy a food stall because on Sundays she sells traditional snacks in the country.  She'll also buy yuca for her business.

With the investment, she hopes to cultivate on time and apply the correct amount of inputs to have a good harvest.  She's also going to set up the food stall to sell more comfortably and safely.

She wants to give her two younger children everything they need to flourish and finish their post-secondary education.

loans.use: to buy seed and herbicide, a food stall, and yuca

loans.name: Julia Maria

texts.es: Doña Julia, es una señora que busca como salir adelante junto a su único hijo quien es mayor de edad e independiente, la acompaña y le brinda apoyo económico, doña María continua con su pequeña pulpería desde hace muchos años, la que le permite pagar sus gastos diarios, ella ha venido haciéndole mejoras a su humilde vivienda, en esta ocasión con este crédito desea cambiar el techo de su casa, que se encuentra en muy malas condiciones y ella necesita prepararse antes de que llegue el invierno, el cual está muy cerca.
texts.en: Julia is a lady who strives to get ahead alongside her only son, who's an independent adult. He keeps her company and provides financial support. Julia María still runs her small grocery store as she has done for several years. It allows her to afford her daily expenses. She has been making improvements in her humble home and on this occasion she wishes to use this loan to replace the roof of her house. It's in very bad condition and she needs to be prepared before winter comes, which will be very soon.

loans.use: to purchase zinc sheets and nails.

loans.name: Flor Herminia

texts.es:
La clienta vive Quevedo. Desde muy pequeña le gusta la costura practicaba haciéndole vestidos a los muñecas luego en una pequeña escuela de corte coció en papel primero mientras aprendía hasta que se volvió una profesional.

Su trabajo lo hace con maquinas industriales de alta costura tiene 4 en la actualidad trabaja con su hija todos los días.

La dificultad que tiene en el negocio es su enfermedad ya que no la deja trabajar como es. Es soltera, tiene 2 hijos uno de 7 años y el otro de13 años uno está en escuela fiscal u el otro en colegio fiscal.

Con el préstamo quiere comprar maquinas. Su sueño es ser contratada por el gobierno para cocer los uniformes de las escuelas fiscales, para con eso contratos y terminar de hacer su casa y tener un taller en su casa.
texts.en:
The client lives in Quevedo.  Ever since she was very little she has liked sewing.  She used to practice making dresses for dolls.  Then, at a small sewing school, she first sewed with paper while she learned.  Then she became a professional.

She does her work with industrial machines for high fashion.  She has four of them.  She currently works with her daughter every day.

The difficulty she has with her business is her state of health, which sometimes keeps her from working as expected.

She is single, and she has two children, ages 7 and 13.  One goes to a public elementary school, and the other goes to a public high school.

She wants to use the loan to buy machines.  Her dream is to be contracted by the government to make public school uniforms.  With these contracts she will finish making her house and she will have a workshop at her house.

loans.use: to buy sewing machines.

loans.name: Rosalie

texts.en:
This is Rosalie. She previously accessed a PHP 16,000 loan that she used to purchase the materials needed to make flower decorations. Her earnings were a big help in the education of her children and in the family's personal, household, and business expenditures.

Rosalie would like to apply for another loan in the amount of PHP 25,000 to buy additional supplies of raw materials needed to make flower decorations. Her profits from business will definitely help her to sustain her family’s daily needs. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Rosalie dreams that her business will flourish and hopes that her children will finish their studies. Every week, she meets up with her co-fellowship members* to share stories of her work.

* All Center for Community Transformation (CCT) community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for the materials needed to make flower decorations, like plastic flowers, newspaper, varnish, white glue, and other materials.

loans.name: Grace

texts.en:
Grace is grateful for the previous loans she received through Milango. The previous season was good and supported her needs. 

Grace looks forward to establishing a charcoal-selling business to complement her grocery store. She is now requesting a loan of 31,500 Kenya shillings to buy a new stock of fruits, vegetables and charcoal to sell.

loans.use: To buy a new stock of fruits, vegetables and charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Maria Auxiliadora

texts.es:
Maria, 52 años de edad, madre de 6 hijos, habitante de la ciudad de Granada. Ella proviene de una familia humilde pero muy trabajadora a los 32 años decidió poner su puesto de granos básicos, ella solía vender en las afueras de los mercados pero con el tiempo logro obtener su propio puesto de venta de granos básicos y estar en un solo lugar, esta actividad la realiza con dos de sus hijos quienes le ayudan con el negocio. 
Ella está solicitando el crédito para comprar frijol al por mayor. La época de invierno se acerca y el precio de este producto aumenta y ella desea mantenerlo a un precio justo y tener productos para vender. Ella desea surtir con más productos su puesto y ofrecer más variedad a su clientela esto le permitirá obtener mejores ingresos y ahorra para su vejez.
texts.en:
María, 52 years old and the mother of six children, lives in the city of Granada. She comes from a very hard working and unassuming family. At the age of 32, she decided to set up a stall selling basic grains. She used to sell on the outskirts of different markets, however over time she succeeded in establishing her own stall in a set place. She conducts the business helped by two of her children.

She is requesting a loan in order to purchase beans wholesale. The winter season is approaching and the price of this product is rising and she wants to charge a fair price and have products to sell. She wants to stock her stall with more products and offer a greater variety to her customers. This will enable her to obtain better earnings and save for her old age.

loans.use: to purchase beans wholesale.

loans.name: Meybol Catalina

texts.es: Meybol, de 30 años de edad, habitante del barrio Pantasma, una zona donde hay mucha pobreza, ella es madre soltera de una hija de 9 años de edad que estudia la primaria, Meyboll es una joven que busca como salir adelante con su hija y se está ayudando con su pequeño negocio la venta de ropa variada, cosméticos entre otros, por eso solicita apoyo de crédito para invertir en la misma para tener productos que ofrecer a sus clientes y con los ingresos atender las necesidades de su hija.
texts.en:
30-year-old Maybol lives in the Pantasma neighborhood, a zone where there is a lot of poverty. She is a single mother with a 9-year-old daughter who studies at primary school. 

Meybol is a young woman who is looking to move forward with her daughter and is using her small business selling an assortment of clothes and cosmetics among other things to help her with this.  

For this reason she is applying for the support of a loan to invest in her business so she has products to offer her customers, and so she can meet the needs of her daughter with the income.

loans.use: to buy an assortment of clothing and cosmetics

loans.name: Pavel

texts.ru:
Павел работает таксистом. Он трудолюбивый, заботится о своей семье. Недавно младшая дочь Павла вышла замуж. Сыглали хорошую свадьбу. 

Павел просит предоставить ему кредит в сумме 24000 гривен на ремонт дома. Он хочет заштукатурить и обклеить пенопластом внешнюю поверхность дома, что поможет Павлу сделать дом более теплым.
texts.en:
Pavel works as a taxi driver.  He is hardworking and takes care of his family.  Not long ago, Pavel's younger daughter got married.  They threw a nice wedding.

Pavel is asking for a loan of 24,000 hryvnia to make home repairs.  He would like to place foam on and plaster the outside of his home in order to make the house warmer.

loans.use: to warm his home

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase fabric, cardboard, glue, paint, etc.

loans.name: Nataliya

texts.ru:
Наталия – из Хуста. Она – замужем, у нее 4 детей. Наталия очень рано овдовела, у нее трагически умер муж. Детей растить самой было очень трудно. Однако потом Наталия повторно вышла замуж и родила еще двоих детей. Наталия очень жизнелюбивая, много работает, стараясь обеспечить своих детей. 
Сумма в 15 000 гривен нужна Наталии для того, чтоб сделать ремонт в доме бабушки, который находится прямо рядом с их собственным домом. Наталия планирует сделать ремонт ванной комнаты, поменять два окна и две межкомнатные двери, а также входные двери, которые пока сильно пропускают холод. Отремонтировав это жилье, туда сможет переехать молодая семья сына Наталии, которая ждет своего первого ребенка на данном этапе.
texts.en:
Nataliya is from Khoost.  She is married, she has 4 children.  Nataliya became a widow very early, her husband died tragically.  She had a very hard time raising her children alone.  However, Nataliya then married a second time and gave birth to two more children.  Nataliya is very active, she works a lot and tries to provide for her children.

Nataliya needs 15,000 hryvnia in order to remodel her grandmother's home that is located right next to her home.  Nataliya plans to remodel the bathroom, replace two windows and two interior doors, as well as the exterior doors that currently let in a lot of cold.  After remodeling the home, the young family of Nataliya's son, that is currently expecting their first child, will be able to move there.

loans.use: to remodel her bathroom, to replace two windows and two inside doors, as well as her entry doors

loans.name: Damas Del Barrio San Antonio Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado  Damas del Barrio San Antonio, está en su ciclo número ocho del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante. Ellas son mujeres muy capaces que se esfuerzan por salir adelante e ir creciendo en el oficio que cada una hace.
Maria, una de las miembros, comenta que se dedica a la compra y venta, como así también de elementos reciclables, como ser plásticos, cartones, aluminios y demás. Cuenta Maria que por medio de este trabajo ella da a su familia lo que necesitan, esta contenta con lo que hace, ya que es un trabajo honesto y no tiene que hacer nada de que avergonzarse.
Solicita de este crédito para la compra de cartones, aluminio, plásticos y demás, para que pueda revenderlos y así tener una mejor ganancia. Agradece por la oportunidad que ella y sus compañeras están recibiendo.
texts.en:
The group called Damas del Barrio San Antonio, is in its eighth cycle of the program of Comité de Mujeres, where all of them work and support getting ahead. They are very competent women who strive to to do well and to grow in the job that each one does.

Maria, one of the members, says that she is dedicated to buying and selling, as well as recyclables, such as plastic, cardboard, aluminum and more. Through this work Maria gives her family what they need. She is happy with what she does as it is an honest job and she does not have to do anything to be ashamed of.

She is asking for this loan in order to buy cardboard, aluminum, plastic and more so she can resell them and thus make a greater profit. She is grateful for the opportunity that she and her companions are receiving.

loans.use: to buy cardboard, aluminum, plastic, and more

loans.name: La  Buena Amistad Group

texts.es:
La Sra. Nora es miembro del  grupo La Buena Amistad
La Sra. Nora tiene 60 años, vive con su esposo y sus 04 hijos que son mayores de edad. Nora tiene su propio negocio, la decisión de trabajar fue por ayudar a sus hijos cuando estos eran pequeños, en la actualidad no puede dejar de hacerlo porque le encanta su trabajo, tiene un puesto en un mercado de su zona donde vende jugos y dulces, allí es muy conocida por los clientes del mercado. Nora utilizara el dinero de su préstamo para comprar frutas frescas, son 10 años que tiene su negocio y durante todo este tiempo ha mejorado mucho. Nora esta agradecida por sus préstamos a EDAPROSPO ya que gracias a ellos ha mejorado su calidad de vida y la de sus hijos.
La Sra. Nora está muy entusiasmada por saber que personas de todo el mundo la van apoyar en su negocio. A Todos los inversionistas, a ella le gustaría decir ¡Muchas gracias!
En la foto aparece de pie y vestida con una casaca color rosada.
texts.en:
Nora is a member of the group La Buena Amistad [Good Friendship].  

Nora is sixty years old and lives with her husband and four children, who are all legally of age.  Nora has her own business; the decision to work was made in order to help her children when they were small.  Presently, she cannot leave her work because she loves her job.  She has a stall in a local market where she sells juices and sweets.  She is well-known among the market's customers.  

Nora will use the money from this loan to buy fresh fruit.  She has had this business for ten years.  During this time, she has improved her business a lot.  

Nora is thankful for the loans from EDAPROSPO; thanks to these loans, she has improved the quality of life for not only herself, but also for her children.

Nora is very enthusiastic to know that people from all over the world are going to support her business.  To all of the Kiva lenders, she would like to say "Thank you very much!"

In the photo, she is standing and wearing a pink colored jacket.

loans.use: to buy fresh fruit to make fruit juice

loans.name: Don Bosco Group

texts.es: Susi es integrante de la Alcancía Comunal “Don Bosco” conformado por 07 socios,  grupo solidario y responsable que ha trabajado bien,  muestra de ello es que no han tenido problemas con sus pagos. Susi de 40 años casada con 02 hijos dependientes. Susi junto con su esposo cuenta con una carpintería, la cual realizan puertas, mesas, entre otros muebles. Lleva más de 10 años dedicándose a dicha actividad. Susi ha tenido que esforzarse mucho  para sacar adelante a su familia y negocio, ya que es un único ingreso. Con el fin de seguir mejorando solicito el crédito para la compra de maderas y pegamentos. El mayor deseo de Susi es de tener su propia casa, pues actualmente vive en casa alquilada. El grupo “Don Bosco” agradecen el crédito brindado ya que hace posible su progreso. Susi  es la segunda del lado derecho,  viste blusa a cuadros color  negro y pantalón azul. Freddy está ubicado en la parte superior lado derecho no pudo llegar a tiempo por motivo de trabajo al igual que Mirian.
texts.en:
Susi is a member of Don Bosco Communal Bank, made up of seven members.  It's a responsible solidarity group that has worked well.  A sign of this is that they haven't had problems making their payments.

Susi is married and has two dependent children.  Susi and her husband have a furniture shop where they make doors, tables, and other furniture.  She has been doing this job for more than 10 years.  Susi says she has had to make a big effort to get her family and her business ahead, because it's her only income.

She requested the loan to buy wood and glue so she can continue to improve.  Susi's greatest desire is to have her own house because currently she lives in a rented house.

Don Bosco Group is grateful for this loan because it makes their progress possible.

Susi is the second one from the right; she's wearing blue pants and a black plaid blouse.  Freddy is located in the upper right photo and was not able to arrive at the payment meeting because of work, nor was Mirian (not pictured).

loans.use: to buy wood and glue

loans.name: Mwanakombo

texts.en:
Mwanakombo is very hardworking. She strives to make her life possible. Here she comes to you for another loan in the amount of KES 50,000 to buy hair braids, shampoo, chemicals and powders to add stock to her salon. This will attract more clients to come to her salon for better services.

She appreciates for the additional support given to her.

loans.use: to buy hair braids, shampoo, chemicals and powders to add stock to her salon

loans.name: Amparo Del Carmen

texts.es: Doña Amparo, de 45 años de edad, su esposo labora como guarda de seguridad, sus hijos son mayores de edad de 21 años en adelante e independientes pero aun así como toda una buena madre se preocupa por ellos para que sigan un buen camino, doña Amparo se auxilia siempre con su pequeño negocio, la venta de ropa y cosméticos que le permite pagar sus gastos del hogar y hasta ayudar a sus hijos cuando no tienen. Con este cuarto crédito desea empezar a construir el muro perimetral de su vivienda para garantizar la seguridad de la familia, ya que la zona donde habita es peligrosa por la delincuencia.
texts.en:
Doña Amparo is 45 years old. Her husband works as a security guard. Her children are all adults, from 21 years old and upwards, and independent. Nevertheless, like all good mothers she worries about them and wants them to follow a good path. 

Doña Amparo always assist the family with her small business selling clothing and cosmetics. This enables her to pay for household expenses and even help her children when they need it. With this fourth loan, she wants to begin to build a perimeter wall around her dwelling in order to ensure her family’s safety since they live in a dangerous crime area.

loans.use: to purchase cement, iron, cement blocks and gravel.

loans.name: Khady Niang's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe est crée le 13 décembre 2008. C'est un groupe très dynamique et solidaire. La plupart de ses membres s'active dans le petit commerce et l'embouche.
Khady, debout à droite de la photo est âgée de 39 ans. Elle est mariée et mère adoptive d'une fille. Elle fait comme activité l'embouche et le commerce. Le prêt reçu lui permet de prendre les 250 000f pour acheter de l'oseille à raison 2000f le baignoire, pour revendre à 5000f. Elle attend la période du ramadan pour revendre car c'est un moment propice à la vente. Avec les 100 000f elle va acheter des poussins et leurs aliments. Les 100 000f qui restent serviront à acheter divers autres produits pour les revendre.
texts.en:
This group was created on December 13, 2008.  It is a very dynamic group made up of members who show a high level of solidarity.  Most of the members of the group are involved in small retail and animal fattening.

Khady, standing on the right, is 39 years old.  She is married and the adoptive mother of a girl.  She fattens up animals and is also involved in retail.

She will use 250,000 francs from her loan to buy some sorrel.  She will buy sorrel at a cost of 2,000 francs per tub and resell for 5,000 francs.  She is waiting for the Ramadan period to resell, since it is a favorable time of year for resale.  

She is also planning to use 100,000 francs to buy some young chickens and some feed.  She will use the remaining 100,000 francs to buy other various products for resale.

loans.use: to buy some sorrel and young chickens.

loans.name: San Expedito Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado  San Expedito está en su ciclo número dos del programa de comité de mujeres, están aprendiendo a trabajar juntas, se ayudan las unas a las otras para poder salir adelante y ayudar a sus familias. Las integrantes del comité fijaron como objetivo principal el crecimiento de cada una de ellas.
 La Sra. Graciela es una de las integrantes, ella se dedica a la costura en general, es muy conocida porque siempre hace muy buen trabajo, son sus mismos clientes quienes le hacen publicidad, y por medio de su trabajo ayuda a su familia. Ella es una persona que desea salir adelante y tener el día de mañana un gran taller de costuras.
Solicita de este crédito para poder comprar insumos con los cuales podrá trabajar, como ser telas, hilos, gomas, botones y demás, ya que estos insumos les serán de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
The group called San Expedito is in its second cycle in the program of Comité de Mujeres. They are learning to work together, helping each other to get ahead and helping their families. The members of the committee set their main goal in the growth of each one of them.

Graciela is one of the members. She is dedicated to sewing in general. She is well known because she always does good work, and it is these same clients that promote her, and through this work she helps her family. She is a person that wants to get ahead and to have a seamstress shop one day.

She is asking for a loan in order to buy supplies with which to work, such as fabrics, thread, elastic, buttons and more, as these supplies will be of much help.

loans.use: to buy fabric, thread, elastic, buttons and more

loans.name: Kokuere Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Kokuere se encuentra en el ciclo 23, este grupo está con las expectativas bien claras, quien ayudar a sus hijos y familiares, luchan por ellos y quieren darles todo lo que necesitan para un futuro mejor al que ellas han tenido.
Ernesta, una de ellas, es comerciante, tiene una pequeña despensa en su casa en la que trabaja desde muy tempranas horas de la mañana, es una persona muy sacrificada y por sobre todo emprendedora, que no teme a trabajar y salir adelante. Su deseo es poder crecer y seguir ayudando a sus seres queridos.
Solicita de este crédito para poder comprar arroz, fideos, leche, y demás insumos para poder seguir con sus ventas. Quiere tener bien surtido su negocio para poder seguir dando una buena variedad a sus clientes.
texts.en:
The group called Kokuere is in its 23rd cycle.  This group has very clear expectations.  They help their children and family members, they struggle for them, and they want to give them everything they need in order to have a better future than the members have had.

Ernesta, a merchant, is one of them.  She has a small store in her house.  She starts working there in the very early hours of the morning.  She is a very selfless person.  Above all, she is very enterprising.  She is not afraid to work and to get ahead.  Her wish is to be able to grow and to continue helping her loved ones.

She is requesting this loan to buy rice, noodles, milk, and other supplies in order to be able to continue with her sales.  She wants to have her business well-stocked in order to be able to continue giving her customers a good variety.

loans.use: to buy rice, noodles, milk, and other supplies

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to do a Level 1 Basic Cooking Training.

loans.name: Norma Petronila

texts.es: Doña Norma, es casada su esposo trabaja como fotógrafo, sus hijos son tres, uno de ellos ya es casado e independiente los dos menores están estudiando y ella pone todo su empeño en el trabajo para poder con los aranceles escolares de ellos, doña Norma labora para la educación y con sus ingresos pretende ir progresando poco a poco con las mejoras de su vivienda, desea continuar con la construcción del muro perimetral que empezó con el crédito anterior, aun tiene materiales pero le hacen falta otros para continuar la obra y con este nuevo préstamo comprara mas, lo que le permitirá culminar con esta mejora que es muy importante para su bienestar y seguridad de la familia.
texts.en:
Doña Norma is married. Her husband works as a photographer. Her children number three: one of them is already married and independent while the younger two are in school. She puts all her effort into her work so that she can pay her younger children’s school fees. Thus she works to educate them and, little by little, to make improvements to her dwelling. 

She wants to continue with the construction of the perimeter wall that she started with the previous loan. She still has materials but she needs to buy more in order to continue with the project. With this new loan, she will buy more so that she can complete this improvement, which is very important for her family’s well-being and security.

loans.use: to purchase cement, blocks, iron and gravel among other items.

loans.name: Maria Auxiliadora Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado MARÍA AUXILIADORA está en su ciclo número SEXTO del programa de comité de mujeres, donde cada una pone todo de sí para ir creciendo y ayudar a su familia. Este grupo está haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, el cual les ayuda a conocer la situación de cada una de ellas.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. María, quien en su última encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza superior, gracias a que ha trabajado arduamente. Ella cuenta que tiene una peluquería, también se debe destacar el trabajo  que ella hace, ya que es una persona muy sacrificada, que desde siempre ha trabajado, y es gracias a ese trabajo y esfuerzo que está saliendo adelante. 
La Sra. Solicita de este crédito para la compra de los insumos para su peluquería, como ser shampoo, enjuagues, gel, tintes, y demás. ya que con ello podrá seguir invirtiendo en su negocio, el cual es su medio de generar ingresos y ayudar a su familia.
texts.en:
The group called María Auxiliadora is in its sixth cycle of the program of Comité de Mujeres, where each one puts all of herself into growing and helping the family. This group is doing the survey for poverty elimination, which helps them to know the situation of each one of them.

One of the members is María, who in the latest survey showed a level of higher poverty, because of which she has to work arduously. She says she has a beauty salon, emphasizing the work that she does, she makes sacrifices, has always worked hard, and thanks to that work and effort she is getting ahead.

She is asking for this loan in order to buy supplies for her beauty salon such as shampoo, rinses, gels, dyes and more, as with this she can continue investing in her business which is her means to livelihood and support for her family.

loans.use: to buy shampoo, rinses, gel, dyes, and more

loans.name: Diouma Ngor's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe est crée le 13 décembre 2008. C'est un groupe très dynamique et solidaire. La plupart de ses membres s'active dans le petit commerce et l'embouche.
Diouma debout à droite de la photo et levant la main, est âgée de 50ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 2 garçons. Elle s'active dans l'embouche ovine et bovine, une activité qu'elle mène depuis 5 ans. Avec le prêt reçu elle va acheter un bœuf à 130 000f pur renfoncer son troupeau. Elle élève les bêtes et au bout de 1 à 2 ans les revend.
Les bénéfices obtenus lui servent à épargner et aussi à entretenir ses petits enfants.
texts.en:
This group was created on December 13, 2008.  It is a very dynamic group, with a high level of solidarity among its members.  Most of its members are involved in small retail and animal fattening.

Diouma is 50 years old.  She is standing at the right-hand side in the photo.  She is married and the mother of two boys.  For the past five years, she has been actively involved in fattening cows and sheep.

She will use her loan to buy an ox at a cost of 130,000 francs.  This will help her to increase the size of her herd.  She raises livestock for resale after one to two years.

She uses her profits to increase her savings and to support her grandchildren.

loans.use: to buy an ox.

loans.name: Torb's Group

texts.en:
Residing in a rural village of the Srey Snom district of Siem Reap province, Torb is 51 years old and married. She has seven children, two of whom are dependents and still in school. To support the family, she and her husband have been farming rice on five hectare of farmland. The current business earns her family about 16,700 KHR per day to meet her family’s needs.

Torb’s group consists of two members who are just joined with VisionFund for this cycle. Now she is leading her group to ask for a loan. As the leader, she is going to use her portion to spend on plowing the field. She hopes to increase her rice crop so as to make a better living and keep her children in school.

loans.use: to pay for plowing the field

location.town: Siem Reap Province, Srey Snom district

loans.name: Yorm's Group

texts.en:
A citizen from a rural village of Siem Reap province’s Srey Snom district, Yorm is 40 years old and widowed with four children, all of whom are dependent on her and still in school. To make a living and support her family, Yorm has been farming rice as her primary business for 5 years. She can earn about 10,000 KHR per day to meet the family’s needs. 

Yorm has been with VisionFund for three cycles and fully paid back the past loans while the other member has been with VisionFund for two cycles. The past loans have helped her to better support her family. Now, she is leading her group to ask for a loan. As the leader, she is going to use her portion to spend on the labor needed to plow the paddy field. With this loan, she hopes to cultivate her rice to earn more income to improve her lifestyle.

loans.use: To pay for the labor needed to plow the paddy field

location.town: Siem Reap Province, Srey Snom district

loans.name: Loyce

texts.en:
Loyce is a married business lady living in Malindi, Kenya. She runs a business dealing in the sale of ladies accessories, such as necklaces, chains, bracelets, earrings, curios, shoes, etc. The business has been in operation for almost three years.

She is applying for a loan of 21,100 Kenya shillings to buy additional stock of curios for sale. Loyce believes she can overcome the challenge of competition in the market and improve on her business.

loans.use: To buy additional stock of curios for resale.

loans.name: 03.03.88 - Quảng Hưng Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Chuyên works in agriculture, farming poultry and cattle. She is requesting a loan to purchase baby livestock cattle to raise and sell in the future.

Chuyên is 57 years old, and she is married with 2 children.
Chuyên is the group leader of the 03.03.88 - Quảng Hưng solidarity group, which consists of 3 members. 
Her children are grown up so Chuyên lives with no dependents in Thanh Hoa city, an urban town in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2012, Chuyên joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Chuyên has successfully repaid 2 loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

Chuyên has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.
The main harship that Chuyên faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Chuyên hopes to travel for vacation within the country, for her family to be healthy and happy, and for her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase baby livestock cattle to raise and sell in the future.

loans.name: Macario

texts.en: Macario is 58 years old, married and has four adult-age children. He is a farmer raising his family in a rural community. Farming is the main source of their income; he plants rice, fruits and vegetables for sale. Aside from that, he also maintains a hog-raising business to earn additional income. He plans to raise more hogs to sell but he doen not have enough capital. For this reason, he is asking for an additional capital of P 30,000.00 to buy feed, vitamins and vaccines needed for the maintenance of his hogs. He is hoping that his loan will be granted in order to strengthen the business and improve their status of living in the future.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins and vaccines needed in hog raising

loans.name: Amanda De Jesús

texts.es:
Amanda de 48 años de edad, es docente de un colegio en la ciudad de Medellín desde hace más de 20 años. Se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la capacitación de un curso de cocina con el fin de adquirir mayor conocimiento y mejorar la salud de su esposo que padece problemas de colesterol y la presión. 
Asegura que su familia es lo más importante para ella y el motor de su existencia, por lo cual desea garantizarles una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
48-year-old Amanda has been a teacher at a school in the city of Medellín for more than 20 years. 

She is applying for a loan to invest in a training course in cooking, with the aim of gaining more knowledge and improving the health of her husband who suffers from cholesterol and blood pressure problems. 

She affirms that her family is the most important thing to her and the driving force of her existence, and for this reason she wants to promise them a better quality of life.

loans.use: to take a training course in basic cooking level I

loans.name: Edith

texts.en: Edith is grateful for the previous loans she has received. Her retail shop is on the rise, and she would like to increase the stock due to the demand she has witnessed of late. She is therefore applying for a loan of 83,500 Kenya shillings to buy retail stock, such as sugar, flour, cooking oil, soap, etc. She believes there is a good season ahead and will be able to meet the required repayments.

loans.use: To buy retail stock, such as sugar, flour, cooking oil, soap, etc.

loans.name: Rachael

texts.en: With the income from this activity she is able to support her family and also cover the health expenses of her children. She is taking out another Kiva loan of Kshs 50,000. The loan is to purchase chickens in order to meet the high demand that occurs at the end of the year.

loans.use: to purchase chickens.

loans.name: Samuel

texts.en: Samuel is a permanent resident of Rwenkuba of the Bushenyi district. He is married with 5 children and lives with 2 of his sisters' children, as she is unable to pay for their fees, so he is giving her a hand. He did not go far in his studies and hence started to fend for himself and the family when he was still young. Being pushed by the need to survive, he started banana farming on a small scale on his family's land that his parents allowed him to cultivate on. Because he is hard working, he has used his small savings to buy even more land where he is constructing a house. This business has grown, giving him an opportunity to support his family and dependents. He is requesting a loan of 3,000,000 UGX to complete the house that he has been constructing; it will accommodate his family, including his aged parents. In the photograph is Samuel and his father. Samuel is the one in the blue, long-sleeved shirt.

loans.use: To complete his house's construction

loans.name: Alejandro

texts.es:
Alejandro de 33 años, es un hombre lleno de  sueños y con un proyecto de vida definido. Asegura que la culinaria es una de sus grandes pasiones, por lo cual, hoy se encuentra solicitando un crédito para capacitarse en el oficio, con el propósito de montar en el mediano plazo un restaurante y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
Asegura que entre sus mayores retos se encuentra brindarle a su esposa la oportunidad de aprender un segundo idioma y garantizarle a su hija una educación de calidad. Razones que lo han motivado a estudiar con el fin de mejorar su condición económica.
texts.en:
Alejandro is 33 years old. He is a man full of dreams and has a defined life project. He says that cooking is one of his great passions. Because of that, he is asking for a loan to train in this profession. The purpose is to open, in the medium term, a restaurant, and improve his family's quality of life.

He says that among his biggest challenges is offering his wife a chance to learn a second language and guarantee his daughter a quality education. For these reasons, he is motivated to study in order to improve his financial condition.

loans.use: to do cooking training.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: acquire training in the kitchen, benefitting his restaurant.

loans.name: Star Group

texts.en:
Elizabeth is the featured borrower of Star Group. She joined with the other group members to apply for a loan from Kiva's partner Al Majmoua, because they have been close friends since they arrived in Lebanon to work for their families' livings.

Elizabeth, pictured on the left, is a 45-year-old married woman. She is a mother of four children, for whom she is working hard to provide a good standard of living. She is working as a housekeeper to send her family in the Philippines the necessary money to pay for her children's education, so she can be proud of what they achieve.

Regina, second from the left, is a 34-year-old divorced mother who is sacrificing her whole life to provide her only child with the best living possible. 
She also works as a housekeeper and her portion of the loan will be sent to the Philippines to pay for her child's education.

Clarita, pictured on the right, is a 44-year-old married woman and mother of two children. Her other group members encouraged her to apply for this loan for the same reasons they had. Education is very important to provide for her children, and she wants to make sure that they will get it exactly as she aims.

Almary, second from the right, is 31 years old and married with five children. She works as a housekeeper and will pay for her children's needs in the Philippines with the applied-for loan.

loans.use: To pay for her children's education in the Philippines

loans.name: Lemcel

texts.en:
Lemcel is married and she works hard to support her family.

She has a fishing business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from fattening pigs. Lemcel is borrowing PHP 50,000 through NWTF to buy bamboo, binder clips and other paraphernalia for fishing.

Lemcel has been sustaining her business activities through her past 15 loans from NWTF and more recently, through Kiva. She is saving enough money so she can continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy bamboo, binder clips and other paraphernalia for fishing.

loans.name: 02130601 Thôn Ht Hoằng Kim Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Thoa has a retail business selling groceries. She is requesting a loan to purchase general products to sell in her store, such as sugar, candy, biscuits, milk, and other items.

Thoa is 47 years old and she is married with two children. She is the leader of a five-member group, the 02130601 Thôn Hiệp Thành Hoằng Kim solidarity group. 

One of Thoa's children is grown, so Thoa supports one dependent. She operates her business in Hoang Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province. Thoa has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.

This is Thoa's first loan with Fund for Thanh Hoa Poor Women. The main hardship that Thoa faces in her business is the lack of capital.

In the future, Thoa hopes for her business to do well, to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business, and for her children to find good jobs.

loans.use: to purchase general inventory items to sell such as sugar, candy, biscuits, and milk.

loans.name: Ghada

texts.en:
Ghada is a 44-year-old married woman and a mother of four children. She has been working in clothing sales for eight years. In this way she helps her husband, who works as a security man, in making their living and covering their family's expenses. Her husband's income is not enough, so they have to work side by side to make sure everything is under control.

Today, Ghada is selling clothes from her house and by visiting other customers' houses to market her merchandise.

The loan applied for with Kiva's partner Al Majmoua will be invested in increasing her merchandise with special summer collection clothing items especially for beach needs and requests.

She is very excited about this loan, and will make sure to invest it properly, hoping that a future loan will be specialized to opening her own clothes-selling shop.

loans.use: To increase her merchandise with specially-released summer collection clothing

loans.name: Sokhom's Group

texts.en:
Sokhom is 43 years old and married. She lives with her family in a rural area located in the Samrong district of the Takeo province. She has four dependent children, two of whom are still in school. Rice farming is the only primary source of her family’s income, and she has been in this business for 25 years. With the current business, she can earn approximately 16,000 KHR per day and save about 7,000 KHR each day for future needs. 

This is the fourth micro-loan for Sokhom with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund. She fully repaid the previous loans which have helped her better support her family with enough food. Now she is leading her group to ask for a loan. Sokhom is going to use her portion to buy materials for building a decent latrine, such as a latrine bowl, tile, drain, sewage receptacle, etc. She hopes this loan will enable her family to have a healthy latrine and improve their standard of living.

loans.use: To buy materials for building a decent latrine, including a latrine bowl, tile, drain, sewage receptacle, etc.

loans.name: Dorothy

texts.en:
Dorothy is a businesslady living in the coastal town of Mariakani. She is a married mother of four and runs a bicycle spare parts shop. The area is partly rural and has a number of people who use bicycles for transport. 

Dorothy was introduced to Milango by her friends. She is asking for a loan of 41,850 Kenya shillings (KES) to purchase spare bicycle parts for sale, and to further use to set up a new sales shop.

loans.use: To purchase spare bicycle parts.

loans.name: Kadidia

texts.fr:
Madame Kadidia a plus de 33 ans, mariée et mère de deux enfants. Elle vit avec son époux et leurs enfants à Sanoubougou I-Kapel Kourou, un des quartiers périphériques de la ville de Sikasso.
Madame Kadidia  après avoir mené beaucoup d’activités sans succès, s’est finalement initiée à cette activité d’achat et de vente d’huile alimentaire, de couscous arabe, maggie et divers articles depuis plus de six ans. Elle mène son activité à la maison et au marché de son quartier où elle dispose d’une place. Elle est beaucoup sollicitée de sa clientèle pour la qualité de ses produits. 
Pour satisfaire sa clientèle de plus en plus croissante, elle décida de rejoindre l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso depuis plus de trois années. Elle est actuellement à son 7ème prêt  et les six précédents ont été bien remboursés.
 Elle compte acheter avec ce prêt 25 bidons d’huile alimentaire, 15 cartons de couscous arabe, 15 cartons de maggie, 10 cartons du thé Arawane et des stocks de condiments. Elle  achète ses marchandises sur commande à Bobo Dioulasso (au Burkina Faso) et aussi dans les huileries de place avant de les revendre en détail au marché de leur localité.
Elle envisage réaliser avec ce prêt un bénéfice mensuel de 190 000 FCFA qui sera utilisé pour contribuer aux dépenses familiales, payer les intérêts de son prêt et investir le reste dans son activité.
texts.en:
Kadidia is over 33 years old, married, and the mother of two children.  She lives with her husband and her children in Sanoubougou I-Kapel Kourou, one of the suburbs of the city of Sikasso.

After being involved in many unsuccessful activities, Kadidia finally learned to buy and sell goods such as oil (for cooking), Arabian couscous, Maggi bouillon cubes and other various goods.  She has now been involved in this activity for over six years.  She works from home and at her local market where she owns a retail outlet.  Thanks to the quality of her products, she receives a high demand from her customers. 

In order to satisfy the needs of an increasing number of customers, she decided to join the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso over three years ago.  She has duly repaid six previous loans and is now on her seventh loan.

She plans to use her loan to buy 25 cans of oil, 15 boxes of Arabian couscous, 15 boxes of Maggi bouillon cubes, 10 boxes of Arawane tea and a stock of condiments.  She orders her merchandise from Bobo Dioulasso (in Burkina Faso) and also from local oil factories.  She resells at the local market to a retail customer base.

Thanks to this loan, Kadidia is expecting to make a monthly profit of 190,000 CFA francs which will be used to contribute to her family's expenses, to pay off her loan's interest and also to reinvest in her business.

loans.use: to buy 25 cans of oil, 15 boxes of Arabian couscous, 15 boxes of Maggi bouillon cubes, 10 boxes of Arawane tea and some condiments.

loans.name: Oksana

texts.ru:
Когда Оксана разошлась с мужем, пришлось научиться обеспечивать себе самостоятельно. С тех пор она ведет достаточно стабильный бизнес, у нее есть свои постоянные клиенты. Благодаря использованию предыдущего кредита от КИВА Оксана смогла увеличить свой доход и обновить кое-что в доме.    
Оксана обратилась за кредитом в 5 000 гривен, чтобы приобрести бытовую химию, косметику и витамины от компании Эмвей. Благодаря дополнительным средствам от КИВА у Оксаны расширится ассортимент и еще больше увеличится доход от реализации приобретенного товара.
texts.en:
After her divorce, Oksana had to learn to be independent and to support herself.  Since then, she has been involved in a rather stable business and she has her own regular clients.  Thanks to a previous loan received from KIVA, Oksana has been able to increase her income and to do a little renovation inside her home.  

Oksana has requested a loan of 5,000 hryvnia for the purchase of household products, cosmetics and vitamins from Amway.  The extra financial support provided by KIVA will help Oksana to strengthen her inventory.  Most importantly, she will be able to increase her income from the sale of the purchased merchandise.

loans.use: to buy household products, cosmetics and vitamins from Amway.

loans.name: Cesar Augusto

texts.es:
Cesar a sus 18 años de edad, tiene claro que es lo que desea para su vida, por lo cual no desaprovecha ninguna oportunidad para salir adelante. En la actualidad labora en una panadería la cual es de propiedad familiar. Allí se dedica a la elaboración de panes y hojaldres, pero desea expandir sus conocimientos y aprender sobre la línea de repostería. Para ello se encuentra solicitando un crédito con el fin de capacitarse y ampliar el portafolio de productos en el negocio.

Sueña con ingresar a la universidad y graduarse como un gran chef de la alta cocina.
texts.en:
Cesar, at 18 years of age, is clear on what his desire for his life is. Therefore, he does not miss out on any opportunity for going forward. Currently, he works in a family member's bakery. There, he makes bread and puff pastries, but he wants to expand his knowledge and learn about making pastries. For this, he is requesting a loan with the goal of learning to make pastries and growing the range of products the business offers.

He dreams of attending college and graduating as a fine dining chef.

loans.use: to train to make pastries

loans.name: Angelica María

texts.es:
Angélica tiene 48 años de edad, y desde que se casó se ha dedicado a cuidar de su familia. Cuenta que siempre le ha apasionado por la cocina, especialmente la repostería. Pasión que hoy quiere desarrollar y dedicarse a la elaboración y venta de bizcochos en su sector. Para ello se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en un curso de pastelería en donde se capacitará y mejorará la técnica.
Sueña con  crear una empresa dedicada a la venta de pasteles, hojaldres, tortas y postres, pero es consciente que éste es un sueño que podrá realizar a mediano plazo.
texts.en:
Angélica, 48, has devoted herself to taking care of her family since she got married.  She says she has always been passionate about cooking, especially pastry-making.

She wants to develop this passion and work making and selling pastry in her area.  This is why she's requesting a loan to invest in a pastry-making course in which she'll train and improve her technique.

She dreams of creating a business dedicated to selling pastry, puff pastry, cakes, and desserts in her area.  She's aware, though, that this is a dream that she'll be able to realize in the medium term.

loans.use: to pay for training in pastry-making

loans.name: Conrado De Jesús

texts.es: Conrado de 60 años de edad. Se desempeña como panadero en un negocio familiar, actividad que se ha convertido en su única fuente de ingresos para el sostenimiento de su hogar. En la actualidad se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la capacitación para la elaboración de bizcochos  y cubiertas. Conocimiento que le permitirá aumentar su nivel de ventas y mejorar la calidad de vida de su núcleo familiar.
texts.en: Conrado is 60 years old. He works as a baker in a family business, a job that has become the only source of income for supporting his family. Currently, he is requesting a loan that he will invest in training to learn how to make pastries and frosting. The knowledge will allow him to grow his sales and to improve his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to train to make pastries and frosting

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: el cliente vive con su esposa y sus dos hijos el tiene un negocio de venta de queso desde hace varios años con las ganancias que obtiene logra cubrir los gastos de su casa, el cliente esta solictando un credito que le permita poder comprar mas mercaderia como: queso duro, quesillo, crema, entre otras cosas para surtir su negocio y asi el pueda obtener mejores ganancias para darle a su familia una mejor estabilidad economica.
texts.en: The client lives with his life and two children. He has had a business selling cheese for several years. With the earnings that he obtains he is able to cover the household expenses. He is asking for a loan in order to to buy merchandise such as: hard cheese, soft cheese, and cream, among others in order to supply his business so he can obtain better profits in order to give his family better financial stability.

loans.use: to buy more cheese and cream for his business

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La Clienta vive con su esposo, sus hijas y su padre en casa propia, es una mujer muy responsable, trabajadora y honrada, trabaja en su propia panadería en la que elabora pan dulce y frances su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia, la clienta solicita un préstamo para invertir en la compra de harina, manteca, latas, levaduras y todo lo necesario para poder producir más. Este proyecto de mejoramiento para su panadería es muy importante para ella puesto que así mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
The borrower lives with her husband, daughters and her father in a house they own. She is a very responsible woman, hard working and honest. She works at her own bakery, where she makes sweet bread and French bread. Her business is located in her place of residence.
The borrower is asking for a loan to invest in the purchase of flour, butter, cans, yeast and all the necessary ingredients to increase production. This project to improve the bakery is very important for her because it will allow her to better the quality of life for her and her family.

loans.use: to purchase flour, yeast, cans, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La Clienta vive con su esposo y sus dos hijos en casa propia; ella posee una tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad, frijoles, leche, huevos, pan, entre otros, tiene muchos años con su negocio y eso le ha regalado experiencia en las ventas que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, esta ubicada en su lugar de residencia, es muy reconocida por los vecinos de la zona , se ha hecho de mucha clientela, pues tiene la tienda surtida, ella quiere acrecentar el negocio y realizar una nueva inversión pero necesita de capital por eso solicita un crédito que le permita comprar lo necesario para su tienda, asegura que cancelara la deuda y a la vez confía en que tendra una mejor calidad de vida
texts.en: The client lives with her husband and two children in her own house.  She has a store where she sells basic staple items like beans, eggs, milk and bread, among others.  She’s had the store for many years and has gained much sales experience that makes it possible for her to earn the best profits.  The store is located at home and is very well known by local residents.  She has a large clientele because the store is well-stocked.  She wants to expand the business and make a new investment in it but needs capital to do so which is why she’s asking for a loan to buy what’s needed for the store.  She is sure that she’ll repay the loan while at the same time trusts that her quality of life will be better.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La clienta vive en casa propia con su mamá y una hermana, tiene un negocio de venta de pupusas desde hace varios años trabaja de lunes a domingo por las tardes y por las mañanas trabaja en una guardería, es conocida en la zona como una persona trabajadora y responsable con sus obligaciones, la clienta esta solicitando un credito para la compra de maiz, chicharron, frijoles, y otras cosas que utiliza para la elaboracion de la pupusas y poder obtener mejores ganancias para tener una mejor estabilidad económica con su familia.
texts.en:
The client lives in her own house with her mother and a sister.  She has a business selling ‘pupusas’ [filled, grilled corn cakes]; she’s had it for several years and works Monday to Sunday in the evenings.  She works in a daycare center during the morning and is known in the area for being very hardworking and responsible with her obligations.

She’s asking for a loan to buy corn, pork, beans and other things she needs to make pupusas in order to earn higher profits and have better economic stability with her family.

loans.use: to buy corn, beans, pork, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La clienta vive en casa de su papa con sus hermanos y su mama, es comerciante de frutas y verduras, desde hace varios años su negocio lo tiene ubicado en el mercado que esta cerca de su lugar de residencia tiene mucha clientela pues vende a buen precio sus verduras, ls clienta solicita un prestamo para poder comprar , papas, tomates, cebollas, platanos tambien frutas sandias, piñas etc. y todo lo que necesita para acrecentar su negocio y asi tener a sus clientes satisfechos cuando la busquen para comprarle sus productos y ella podra tener mejores ganancias que le ayudaran a darle una mejor vida a su familia
texts.en: The client lives in her father's house along with her siblings and her mother.  She sells fruits and vegetables.  For several years her business has been located in the market near her home.  She has many customers because she sells her vegetables at a good price.  She is requesting a loan to buy potatos, tomatoes, onions, bananas, watermelon, pineapples, etc., and everything that she needs to grow her business and keep her customers satisfied when they look for her in order to buy her products.  She can then have better earnings which will help her to provide a better life for her family.

loans.use: to buy tomatoes, onions, potatos, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: el cliente vive con su esposa y sus 2 hijos en casa propia, el es muy trabajador y responsable desde hace 7 años se dedica a la  producción y venta de productos lácteos en la zona donde reside. Tiene muy buena clientela ya que ha sabido ganarse la confianza de sus clientes. Ofrece calidad y buenos precios en sus productos, ha decidido invertir en el cuidado de sus ganados ya que de eso depende su negocio. Por eso ha solicitado un crédito para poder comprar vitaminas para el ganado y ajustar para la compra de una vaca lechera que le permita crecer en el negocio. Con esto espera obtener resultados favorables y continuar brindando la ayuda económica a su hogar que tanto lo necesita.
texts.en:
This client lives with his wife and 2 children in their own home. He is very hardworking and responsible. 

For the past 7 years he has been producing and selling dairy goods in his local area. He has a very good customer base as he has earned his customers’ trust. He supplies products that are of a good quality and price. 

He has decided to invest in the care of his livestock as he depends on them for his business.

For that reason he has requested a loan to enable him to buy vitamins for his livestock and to settle the bill on the purchase of a dairy cow which will allow him to grow the business. He hopes that then his earnings will be more favourable and that he can continue to provide the financial support to his household that it needs.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow and vitamins, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La cliente vive con su esposo, sus dos hijos y su mama en casa propia, ella tiene un negocio de ventas de pupusas desde hace varios años, con las ganancias que obtiene y con la ayuda de su esposo logran cubrir algunos gastos de su hogar, La clienta desea acrecentar su negocio comprando mesas y sillas y tambien materia prima para elaborar las pupusas pero con lo que gana no le alcanza para hacer esa inversion por eso ella solicita un credito que le permita poder comprar lo antes mencionado para que su negocio siga adelante y ella pueda seguir llevando el pan de cada dia a su hogar.
texts.en: The borrower lives with her husband, two children and mother in her own house.  She has been in business selling pupusas (stuffed tortillas) for several years.  With her earnings and help from her husband she is able to cover  the household expenses.  She wants to expand her business buying tables and chairs and ingredients to make pupusas, but does not have enough money for the investment.  Therefore, she is requesting a loan to buy what she needs for her business to prosper and to continue putting food on the table every day.

loans.use: To buy tables and chairs, as well as corn, beans, cheese, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: la clienta vive con su esposo y su hijo en cas propia, es comerciante de frutas y verduras desde hace varios  eso le ha dado la experiencia necesaria para poder tener su negocio vende en el mercado que esta cerca de su lugar de residencia tiene mucha clientela pues vende a buen precio sus frutas y verduras, la clienta solicita un prestamo para poder comprar cebollas, chiles verdes, papas, pepinos y todo lo que necesita para acrecentar su negocio y asi tener a sus clientes satisfechos cuando la busquen para comprarle sus productos y ella podra tener mejores ganancias que le ayudaran a darle a su familia una mejor vida.
texts.en: This client lives with her husband and their son in their own house. She sells fruits and vegetables and has done for some years. This has given her the experience necessary to have her business in the market which is close to where she lives. She has many customers as she sells her fruits and vegetables at a good price. She is requesting a loan to be able to buy onions, green chiles, potatoes, cucumbers, and everything she needs to increase her business and ensure that her customers are happy when they go to her to buy her produce. And she will be able to have better profits which will help her to give her family a better life.

loans.use: to buy onions, potatoes, green chiles, cucumbers, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: el cliente vive en casa de una tia con su compañera de vida y su hijo de 2 años de edad, el tiene un negocio de ventas de mochilas y malatines de todo tipo y tamaño desde hace varios años, su negocio lo tiene ubicado en el mercado que esta cerca de su lugar de residencia, con las ganancias que obtiene logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el cliente quiere acrecentar su negocio pero no cuenta con suficiente capital para realizarlo por eso solicita un credito que le permita comprar mas mercaderia mochilas, maleines y cinchos para tener mejores ganancias y seguirle dando a su familia lo que necesita sin limitacion alguna.
texts.en:
The borrower lives in his aunt''s house with his partner and their 2-year-old son.  For several years, he has had a business selling all kinds of backpacks and duffle bags of varying sizes and styles.  His business is located in the market near where he lives.  With the profits he makes, he is able to cover his household expenses.

His customers want him to grow his business, but he lacks the funds to do so.  For this reason, he is asking for a loan that will allow him to buy more goods, including backpacks, duffle bags, and belts.  In this way, he will obtain better profits and continue giving his family what they need without limitation.

loans.use: buy backpacks, belts, and duffle bags.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La clienta vive con su familia en casa propia, Ella tiene una pequeña tienda en la que vende productos perecederos como refrescos, golosinas, dulces, aceite de comida y otras serie de artículos comestibles y no comestibles como papel higenico, perfumes, cremas, desodorantes, etc. a través de este comercio logra cubrir los gastos de su casa, la clienta busca mejorar su calidad de vida, por lo que solicita un credito para incrementar la variedad de artículos en su tienda, lo que le permitiría incrementar las ganancias de su negocio y mejorar las condiciones de vida de su grupo familiar.
texts.en:
The customer lives with her family in her own home. She has a small shop where she sells perishables like drinks, candy, sweets, cooking oil and other food and non-food items like toilet paper, perfumes, creams, deodorants, etc. This business allows her to cover the household expenses.

The customer striving for a better quality of life, for which she is requesting the loan to increase the variety of products in her shop, which will allow her to earn more money and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, bread, sweets, perfumes, lotions etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sweets (canned coconut and tamarind), etc.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: la clienta es una persona muy trabajadora, quien se dedica de lleno a su negocio, todo con el único deseo de salir adelante y de esta manera brindarle una vida mejor a su familia, vive junto a su esposo y sus 4 hijos en casa propia. Ella posee una venta de frutas y verduras, la cual esta ubicada en el mercado que esta cerca de su lugar de residencia desde hace 12 años, su esposo le ayuda con el negocio. La Clienta solicita un préstamo para poder comprar papayas, guineos, piñas, etc. ya que de esta manera ella podrá vender más, lo cual es su prioridad, ya que de esta manera podrá darles una vida mejor a su familia.
texts.en:
The client is a very hard-working person who is fully dedicated to her business, her only wish being to get ahead and thus provide her family with a better life. She lives with her husband and their four children in their own home. She has had a fruit and vegetable stand, which is located in a market close to her place of residence, for twelve years.

Her husband helps her with the business. The client is requesting a loan in order to be able to buy papayas, bananas, pineapples, etc., since in this way she will be able to sell more, which is her priority since this is how she can give her family a better life.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables wholesale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy plastic rolls, laminates, magazines, etc

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: el cliente se dedica a la agricultura desde hace varios años y eso le ha dado la capacidad y el conocimiento necesario para asistir sus cultivos, su principal siembra es el maíz y el frijol, comercializa sus cultivos en agencias de compra-venta de granos básicos que están cerca de su lugar de residencia, con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas ayuda en los gastos que su familia tiene, vive en casa de su suegra con su compañera de vida y su hija de 2 años de edad, el esta solicitando un crédito para poder comprar insumos agrícolas que le ayuden en la siembra de sus cultivos como: abonos, semillas, fertilizantes asi como muestra la fotgrafia y poder tener mejores ganancias y seguir ayudando en los gastos de su casa sin ninguna limitación.
texts.en:
The client has been farming for several years, which has given him the ability and knowledge to take care of his crops. He mainly plants corn and beans, which he sells to commercial grain buyers close to his home. The profits from his sales help pay family expenses. 

He lives with his life partner and two-year-old daughter in his mother-in-law's house. He has applied for a loan to buy agricultural supplies like manure, seed, and fertilizer, as shown in the photo, to plant his crops so that he can earn more income and continue to help pay household expenses.

loans.use: to buy weed killer, manure, pesticide, fertilizer, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La clienta vive con su esposo y sus hijos, ella tiene un negocio de salon de belleza desde hace varios años en su lugar de residencia trabaja todos los dias tiene mucha clientela pues trabaja muy bien, con las ganancias que obtiene y con la ayuda de su esposo logran solventar los gastos de su hogar. La clienta solicita un credito para poder comprar productos para su salon de belleza como: cremas, shampoos, ganchos para el cabello, tijeras, tientes para el cabello entre otras cosas que necesita y asi podra obtener mejores ganancias que le ayudaran a tener una mejor estabilidad economica
texts.en:
